definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Ex 27:15 shoulder, shoulder-blade, side (NH id.; Aram [[כַּתְפָּא]], katpo0 Ar. katifun);—abs. ´[[כ]] Zec 7:11 +; cstr. [[כֶּתֶף]] 1Ki 6:8 +, app. [[כָּתֵף]] Is 11:14 (but regard as appos., or rd. [[כֶּתֶף]]); sf. [[כְּתֵפִי]] Job 31:22; [[כְּתֵפָם]] 1Ch 15:15; pl. abs. [[כְּתֵפׂת]] Ex 28:7 +, [[כְּתֵפוֹת]] 1Ki 7:30, 1Ki 7:34; cstr. [[כִּתְפׂת]] Ex 28:12 +, [[כִּתְפוֹת]] Ez Eze 41:2 +; du. sf. [[כִּתֵפָיו]] De 33:12 + 3 t., [[כְּתֵפֶיהָ]] 1Ki 7:34; —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: of man, shoulder, shoulder-blade (while [[שְׁכֶם]], q.v. = neck and shoulders), [[כְּידוֹן נְחשֶׁת בֵּין כְּתֵפָיו]] 1Sa 17:6; cf. fig. of ´[[י]]'s dwelling between the shoulders of Benj. De 33:12 (v. Dr); [[כְּתֵפִי מִשִּׁכְמָה תִפּוֹל]] Job 31:22 my shoulder-blade, from the shoulder let it fall; as support for burdens Ju Jdg 16:3, Ez Eze 12:6, Eze 12:7, Eze 12:12, Is 46:7, Is 49:22 (in fig.), Ex 28:12, Nu 7:9 (both P), 1Ch 15:15, 2Ch 35:3; cf. [[מְרוּטָה]] ´[[כָּל־כ]] Ez Eze 29:18 every shoulder was rubbed bare (of Nebuch.'s soldiers chafed by armour and toil); as aim of bird of prey Is 11:14 (fig.); cf. shoulder of Moab Ez Eze 25:9 (fig., i.e. the side of M. exposed to invasion): Ez Eze 29:7 b rd. prob. [[כַּף]] (LXX. SyrVer Sm Co, cf. v:a).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of beasts, Is 30:6 (carrying), Ez Eze 34:21 (thrusting, in fig.), [[סׂרָָרֶת]] ´[[כ]] Zec 7:11 a refractory shoulder (refusing the yoke, fig.), so Ne 9:29; of choice meat Ez Eze 24:4 (‖[[יׇרֵח]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = shoulder-pieces (alw. pl.) of ephod Ex 28:7, Ex 28:12, Ex 28:25, Ex 28:27 = Ex 39:4, Ex 39:7, Ex 39:18, Ex 39:20 (P).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: slope side, of mountain, [[כֶּתֶף יׇם־כִּנֶּרֶת]] Nu 34:11, i.e. the mt.-slopes NE. of the lake, cf. Jos 15:8, Jos 15:10, Jos 15:11, Jos 18:12, Jos 18:13, Jos 18:16, Jos 18:18, Jos 18:19 (all P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: opposite side (s), sc. of door or entrance, of tabernacle-court Ex 27:14, Ex 27:15 = Ex 38:14, Ex 38:15 (all P), of temple 1Ki 6:8, 1Ki 7:39, 1Ki 7:39, 1Ki 7:39 = 2Ch 4:10, 2Ki 11:11, 2Ki 11:11 = 2Ch 23:10, 2Ch 23:10; cf. Ez Eze 40:18, Eze 40:40, Eze 40:40, Eze 40:41, Eze 40:44, Eze 40:44, Eze 41:2, Eze 41:26, Eze 46:19, Eze 47:1, Eze 47:2.
supports of the bases for the lavers beside the temple 1Ki 7:30, 1Ki 7:30, 1Ki 7:34, 1Ki 7:34.
